hybrid_integration.constraint: IF (Neural_Prediction XOR Symbolic_Law) == TRUE THEN REJECT
hybrid_integration.evolution: IF Prediction improves Logic_Efficiency THEN EVOLVE_SKILL

modules.name: Enterprise Anchor Sequencing
modules.description: Lead with largest deal to establish social proof for subsequent closes

symbolic_gates.name: ANCHOR_DEAL_IDENTIFICATION
symbolic_gates.logic: IF deal.arr >= lane.median_arr * 1.5 THEN flag_as_anchor

symbolic_gates.name: SOCIAL_PROOF_PROPAGATION
symbolic_gates.logic: IF anchor.closed THEN boost_confidence(similar_prospects, +0.15)

symbolic_gates.name: SEQUENCE_OPTIMIZATION
symbolic_gates.logic: SORT pipeline BY anchor_proximity DESC, close_probability DESC

modules.name: Growth Parallel Stakeholder Engagement
modules.description: Engage multiple decision-makers simultaneously via Dan-Clone parallelism

symbolic_gates.name: STAKEHOLDER_MAP_GENERATION
symbolic_gates.logic: IDENTIFY all decision_makers WHERE influence_score >= 0.3

symbolic_gates.name: CLONE_ASSIGNMENT_PARALLEL
symbolic_gates.logic: ASSIGN dan_clone[n] TO stakeholder[n] FOR ALL n IN stakeholders

symbolic_gates.name: CONSENSUS_AGGREGATION
symbolic_gates.logic: IF ALL stakeholder.sentiment >= 0.7 THEN advance_to_close

symbolic_gates.name: OBJECTION_ROUTING
symbolic_gates.logic: ROUTE objection TO specialist_clone BY objection.category

modules.name: SMB Velocity Stack
modules.description: Batch similar-profile prospects for rapid sequential closing

symbolic_gates.name: PROFILE_CLUSTERING
symbolic_gates.logic: CLUSTER prospects BY industry, size, pain_point SIMILARITY >= 0.85

symbolic_gates.name: BATCH_SEQUENCE_EXECUTION
symbolic_gates.logic: EXECUTE close_sequence ON batch WHERE sequence_latency < 2ms

modules.name: Gateway Latency Prediction
modules.description: Pre-warm settlement gateways based on deal stage prediction

symbolic_gates.name: CLOSE_PROBABILITY_INFERENCE
symbolic_gates.logic: PREDICT close_probability FROM deal_signals WHERE confidence >= 0.8

symbolic_gates.name: GATEWAY_PREWARM
symbolic_gates.logic: IF close_probability >= 0.7 THEN prewarm(optimal_gateway)

symbolic_gates.name: LATENCY_OPTIMIZATION
symbolic_gates.logic: SELECT gateway WHERE predicted_latency <= 1.0ms

symbolic_gates.name: SETTLEMENT_STAGING
symbolic_gates.logic: STAGE settlement_data WHERE close_probability >= 0.85

symbolic_gates.name: ROLLBACK_GUARD
symbolic_gates.logic: IF close_failed THEN cleanup(staged_resources) WITHIN 100ms

modules.name: Expansion Trigger Timing
modules.description: Identify optimal upsell window from usage telemetry patterns

symbolic_gates.name: USAGE_PATTERN_ANALYSIS
symbolic_gates.logic: ANALYZE usage_telemetry WHERE growth_rate >= 0.15/month

symbolic_gates.name: CAPACITY_THRESHOLD_DETECTION
symbolic_gates.logic: IF usage >= plan_capacity * 0.8 THEN flag_expansion_ready

symbolic_gates.name: SENTIMENT_WINDOW_DETECTION
symbolic_gates.logic: IF customer_sentiment >= 0.85 AND usage_growing THEN optimal_window

symbolic_gates.name: UPSELL_OFFER_GENERATION
symbolic_gates.logic: GENERATE offer WHERE offer.value >= customer.projected_need * 1.2

symbolic_gates.name: TIMING_OPTIMIZATION
symbolic_gates.logic: SCHEDULE outreach WHERE day_of_week IN [Tue, Wed, Thu] AND hour IN [10-14]

symbolic_gates.name: EXPANSION_SETTLEMENT
symbolic_gates.logic: EXECUTE expansion_settlement WITH existing_account_link

modules.name: Fulfillment Preload
modules.description: Begin provisioning before contract signature based on intent signals

symbolic_gates.name: INTENT_SIGNAL_AGGREGATION
symbolic_gates.logic: AGGREGATE intent_signals WHERE signal_strength >= 0.75

symbolic_gates.name: PRELOAD_AUTHORIZATION
symbolic_gates.logic: IF intent_confidence >= 0.9 AND risk_score <= 0.02 THEN authorize_preload

symbolic_gates.name: RESOURCE_STAGING
symbolic_gates.logic: STAGE resources WHERE rollback_cost <= preload_benefit * 0.1

symbolic_gates.name: PRELOAD_ABORT_GUARD
symbolic_gates.logic: IF deal_status == lost THEN abort_preload WITHIN 500ms

modules.risk_note: Acceptable +0.02 risk delta with guard gates

modules.name: Proctor Early Warning
modules.description: MSR shadow-audit detects negotiation drift before conversion loss

symbolic_gates.name: DRIFT_PATTERN_DETECTION
symbolic_gates.logic: DETECT drift WHERE negotiation_trajectory DEVIATES FROM optimal_path

symbolic_gates.name: EARLY_WARNING_SIGNAL
symbolic_gates.logic: IF drift_score >= 0.15 THEN alert_orchestrator PRIORITY high

symbolic_gates.name: CORRECTION_RECOMMENDATION
symbolic_gates.logic: GENERATE correction_action FROM historical_recovery_patterns

modules.name: Fiscal Gate Bypass Safe
modules.description: Pre-validated contract terms skip redundant fiscal review

symbolic_gates.name: TEMPLATE_VALIDATION_CHECK
symbolic_gates.logic: IF contract_template IN pre_approved_templates THEN bypass_eligible

symbolic_gates.name: VARIANCE_DETECTION
symbolic_gates.logic: IF contract_variance FROM template <= 0.0 THEN approve_bypass

modules.note: Elite Gate integrity maintained via pre-approval mechanism

modules.name: Legal Template Match
modules.description: Auto-select optimal contract template based on prospect profile

symbolic_gates.name: PROFILE_ANALYSIS
symbolic_gates.logic: ANALYZE prospect WHERE industry, size, jurisdiction EXTRACTED

symbolic_gates.name: TEMPLATE_SCORING
symbolic_gates.logic: SCORE templates BY profile_match WHERE match_score >= 0.9

symbolic_gates.name: TEMPLATE_SELECTION
symbolic_gates.logic: SELECT template WHERE score == MAX(scores) AND counsel_approved

modules.name: Clone Specialization
modules.description: Route prospects to highest-affinity Dan-Clone based on vertical

symbolic_gates.name: VERTICAL_CLASSIFICATION
symbolic_gates.logic: CLASSIFY prospect.vertical FROM company_signals WITH confidence >= 0.85

symbolic_gates.name: CLONE_AFFINITY_SCORING
symbolic_gates.logic: SCORE clones BY vertical_expertise WHERE historical_conversion tracked

symbolic_gates.name: OPTIMAL_ROUTING
symbolic_gates.logic: ROUTE prospect TO clone WHERE affinity_score == MAX(scores)

symbolic_gates.name: LOAD_BALANCING_GUARD
symbolic_gates.logic: IF clone.load >= 0.9 THEN route_to_second_best

constitutional_compliance.CB_PDO_01: All modules have Proof of Logic
constitutional_compliance.CB_ML_01: All inference explainable via Symbolic Trace

certification_requirements.neural_understanding_test: Explain 3 ML-discovered patterns in symbolic terms
